T02D2794:157a-0: @157a * // dpal spyan ras gzigs rdo rje thod pa can la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2794:157a-1: dpal ldan ye shes rdo rje 'dzin dang bde ba che //
T02D2794:157a-2: mgo phyed khrag bkang nyams dgu'i gar gyis rol par bzhugs //
T02D2794:157a-3: me tog 'dab dbus ge sar rang gi snying po bzhin //
T02D2794:157a-4: lha mchog gis mtshan ye shes lha mo bzhis btud 'dud //
T02D2794:157a-5: blo ldan cho ga bzang shes pas //
T02D2794:157a-6: bde chen dngos grub nye ba'i phyir //
T02D2794:157a-7: ka p'a la 'dra'i gnas su ni //
T02D2794:157a-8: ka p'a la yi dngos grub bsgrub //
T02D2794:157a-9: mtshan bzang rin chen mgo phyed la //
T02D2794:157a-10: ga bur gla rtsi tsandan sogs //
T02D2794:157a-11: sna tshogs dri zhim byugs byas te //
T02D2794:157a-12: gso sbyong can gyis dkyil 'khor bri //
T02D2794:157a-13: seng khri nyi zla padmo dang //
T02D2794:157a-14: dbugs bral gdan la bzhag nas ni //
T02D2794:157a-15: lnga mtshan lnga phrag lnga rab dgang //
T02D2794:157a-16: bde gshegs ring bsrel snying por gzhug //
T02D2794:157a-17: 'dab brgyad rtsibs brgyad mu khyud phreng //
T02D2794:157a-18: bkra shis brgyad dang rin chen brgyad //
T02D2794:157b-0: brgya phrag grub pa'i rdzas 'dzin @157b pa //
T02D2794:157b-1: sgeg mo mdzes lha mos bskor dbus //
T02D2794:157b-2: 'dab bzhi rdo rjes mtshan pa'i rtser //
T02D2794:157b-3: rgyal po'i pho brang khri bzangs can //
T02D2794:157b-4: legs bskyed de mtha' phyogs bzhi'i char //
T02D2794:157b-5: lha mo bzhi yi thod pa dgod //
T02D2794:157b-6: glang chen myos pa'i mche ba rno dang smad 'tshong chang 'tshong me long dang //
T02D2794:157b-7: sa dbang mnga' bdag cod pan dpa' bo sen mo de bzhin dka' thub 'dzin kha spu //
T02D2794:157b-8: bde gshegs sku khrus tshil chen dang ni g-yas su 'khyil ba'i dung dkar rnams //
T02D2794:157b-9: phyogs mtshams rin chen bum pa bzang la brgyad par bya //
T02D2794:157b-10: de nas sngags pa kha shar bltas //
T02D2794:157b-11: gos mchog phyi dang dkar dmar lhub //
T02D2794:157b-12: me tog phreng bas spras gon te /
T02D2794:157b-13: g-yas g-yon rdo rje'i thod gzung 'dug /'jig rten mgon po bde chen sku //
T02D2794:157b-14: dkar la dmar gsal mdangs mnga' ba //
T02D2794:157b-15: rdo rje rin chen rus pas spud //
T02D2794:157b-16: rdo rje thod 'dzin nga rgyal bya //
T02D2794:157b-17: de mdun rdo rje phreng ldan ma //
T02D2794:157b-18: dmar la dkar gsal shin tu mdzes //
T02D2794:157b-19: rdo rje gri gug mgo phyed can //
T02D2794:157b-21: phyi nang gsang bcas rnal 'byor gyis //
T02D2794:157b-22: cho ga bla ma'i man ngag bzhin //
T02D2794:157b-23: mchod byas ye shes pa bkug la //
T02D2794:157b-24: 'dod pa drag pos gsol ba gdab //
T02D2794:157b-25: bde chen 'jig rten gsum mgon ni //
T02D2794:157b-26: shes rab rdo rje 'bar ba dang //
T02D2794:157b-27: snying rje chen po ka p'a la //
T02D2794:157b-28: gnyis med ye shes hr'i: yig 'dzin //
T02D2794:157b-29: rdo rje mkha' 'gro rdo rje can //
T02D2794:157b-30: dkar mo sgeg mo bde ster ma //
T02D2794:157b-31: gri gug dang ni thod pa thogs //
T02D2794:157b-32: gtso chen gtso mo nyid phyag 'tshal //
T02D2794:157b-33: ae ma'o stobs bdag brtse slad du //
T02D2794:157b-34: ka p'a la ni bde chen snod //
T02D2794:157b-35: dngos grub phyir ni shes rab thabs //
T02D2794:157b-36: snyoms par 'jug pa mdzad du gsol //
T02D2794:157b-37: de ltar bstod dang gsol ba yis //
T02D2794:157b-38: gtso bo'i thugs kar bskul ba na /
T02D2794:157b-39: 'dab bzhi lha mo phyogs kyi lhas //
T02D2794:157b-40: rang rang rjes mthun mchod par bya //
T02D2794:157b-41: de nas shes rab thabs snyoms zhugs //
T02D2794:157b-42: dkar dmar aa phreng ka phreng rgyun //
T02D2794:157b-43: bde chen phyi nang skyug sbyangs nas //
T02D2794:157b-44: ring bsrel la ni lha bstim bya //
T02D2794:157b-47: rdzas rnams 'phyur ba mthong nas ni //
T02D2794:157b-48: mchod pa chen po brtsam par bya //
